value.title: Start your Power BI journey with Guy in a Cube
value.excerpt: Want to learn Power BI from the masters?   Coming from Microsoft Excel and not sure where to start? Or, maybe you've used Power BI but want to make sure you are doing the right thing. Guy in a Cube has a course for you!  Power BI Blueprint: A step-by-step guide to creating report with Power BI.  https://guyinacu.be/courses
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XogUe3nvPto" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Talking DATA end to end with Buck Woody
value.excerpt: Where does your data come from? What do you need to consider with your data? Buck Woody explored the world of data and how services like Azure Synapse Analytics and Power BI can help you in your journey!  Connect with Buck: https://twitter.com/BuckWoodyMSFT https://www.linkedin.com/in/buckwoody/  üì¢

value.title: The most UNDERUSED feature in Power BI???
value.excerpt: What would you say is the most UNDERUSED feature of Power BI? Adam gives you his opinion and talks about why he thinks that is. Do you agree? value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data.  Make sure you have the September 2020 version of Power BI Desktop, or later.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-smart-narrative

value.title: To Pivot or Unpivot? That is the question!
value.excerpt: Sometimes your data isn't shaped the right way. Have you tried the Pivot or Unpivot methods in Power Query? They can help get your data looking the right way for your Power BI reports!  Pivot columns https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-query/pivot-columns  Unpivot columns https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-query/unpivot-column

value.title: Top 5 things to get started with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Getting started with Azure Synapse Analytics? Here are 5 things you should know as you begin your journey! Already been using Synapse SQL dedicated pools? value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. This takes the concatenate values quick measure to the next level.  Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/

value.title: Using the Key Influencer visual in Power BI Desktop

value.title: What the heck is USERPRINCIPALNAME in Power BI? (Row-Level Security)
value.excerpt: Ever wonder what USERPRINCIPALNAME is in DAX within Power BI? Or the difference between USERPRINCIPALNAME and USERNAME? Hint - It's used with Row-Level Security.  New Row-Level Security course from Guy in a Cube - https://guyinacu.be/courses  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: Where do you add that new column in any analytics tool?
value.excerpt: You need to add a new column in Power BI - or any business analytics tool. Where do you add the column? Is there a cost to that? Matthew Roche explains his thoughts on his maxim that has everyone talking!  Connect with Matthew Roche Twitter: https://twitter.com/SQLAllFather LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/matthewroche/

value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Adam explores the data protection capabilities within Power BI using security labels and cloud app security.  Data Protection documentation overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-security-data-protection-overview
